game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost temple
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a long-lost temple deep in the jungle, containing an ancient artifact of great power. Retrieve the artifact and bring it back to the village elder.
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces, a magical amulet, and the gratitude of the villagers

task.objective: Gather information about the lost temple from the village elder's journal
task.description: Read through the village elder's journal to learn more about the location and layout of the lost temple.

task.objective: Explore the jungle and find the entrance to the lost temple
task.description: Brave the dangers of the jungle and search for the hidden entrance to the lost temple.

task.objective: Navigate through the temple's traps and puzzles to reach the artifact
task.description: Use your wits and reflexes to overcome the deadly traps and solve the ancient puzzles that guard the artifact.
